thread.title: Modern and spacious though basic and you do get a good nights sleep and a good breakfast.
thread.title_full: Modern and spacious though basic and you do get a good nights sleep and a good breakfast. - Review of Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 53edwardw
title: Modern and spacious though basic and you do get a good nights sleep and a good breakfast.
text:
A new, modern and basic hotel in Dalston, near Hackney in London. It's on several bus routes and just 5 minutes walk to 2 overland train stations with very frequent services.
The rooms are spacious with good sized bathrooms and excellent soundproofing. Free WiFi gives a good signal in the rooms. The inexpensive buffet breakfast includes cereals, fruit, juices, yoghurts, toast, croissants and full english breakfast as well as a wide range of teas and coffees. The restaurant also opens in the evening with a range of pizzas, burgers, salads etc. It's very good value and does the job well.
